text: Aur jab marium kay betay essa ney kaha aey (meri qom) bani israeel! Mein tum sab ki taraf Allah ka rasool hun mujh say pehlay ki kitab toraat ki mein tasdeeq kerney wala hun aur apney baad aaney walay aik rasool ki mein tumhen khushkhabri sunaney wala hun jin ka naam ahmed hai phir jab woh unn kay pass khuli daleelen laye to yeh kehney lagay yeh to khula jadoo hai
